name: @substrate/extension
description: Browser extension to manage substrate-based blockchain light clients
author: Parity Technologies

scripts.build: webpack --config webpack.prod.js && cd dist && zip -r packed-extension.zip .
scripts.dev: yarn run prebuild && webpack --node-env development --config webpack.dev.js
scripts.bundle-source-code: cp tsconfig.json tsconfig_bkp.json && mv tsconfig.ext.json tsconfig.json && yarn run clean && rm -rf node_modules && zip -r substrate-connect_source-code.zip . -x 'node_modules/*' 'dist/*' 'tsconfig_bkp.json' && mv tsconfig_bkp.json tsconfig.json && mv substrate-connect_source-code.zip ../..
